Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
Triangle
public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
Triangle.java represents a triangle in the Euclidean space.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static double EPSILON  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Triangle()
    Construct a new Triangle (default constructor) from 3 default Points:(1,0),(-1,0),(0,1)
    Triangle​(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, double x3, double y3)
    Constructor that create Triangle object using six numbers that each pair of arguments represents the Triangle vertex.
    Triangle​(Point p1, Point p2, Point p3)
    constructor which gets 3 vertices and set them to the triangle
    Triangle​(Triangle other)
    Constructor which clones a triangle using given triangle.

    boolean equals​(Triangle other)

  • Constructor Details

    • Triangle

      public Triangle()
      Construct a new Triangle (default constructor) from 3 default Points:(1,0),(-1,0),(0,1)

    • Triangle

      public Triangle​(Point p1, Point p2, Point p3)
      constructor which gets 3 vertices and set them to the triangle
      Parameters:
      p1 - The first vertex of the desired triangle
      p2 - The second vertex of the desired triangle
      p3 - The third vertex of the desired triangle

    • Triangle

      public Triangle​(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, double x3, double y3)
      Constructor that create Triangle object using six numbers that each pair of arguments represents the Triangle vertex. If the values of the Triangle vertices are invalid the method sets the Triangle vertices to it's default values.
      Parameters:
      x1 - The x coordiante of the first vertex
      y1 - The y coordiante of the first vertex
      x2 - The x coordiante of the second vertex
      y2 - The y coordiante of the second vertex
      x3 - The x coordiante of the third vertex
      y3 - The y coordiante of the third vertex

    • Triangle

      public Triangle​(Triangle other)
      Constructor which clones a triangle using given triangle.
      Parameters:
      other - A valid Triangle to clone

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid​(Point p1, Point p2, Point p3)
      Method which checks if the point arguments can behave like valid triangle vertices.
      Parameters:
      p1 - The first vertex of the triangle
      p2 - The second vertex of the triangle
      p3 - The third vertex of the triangle
      Returns:
      true if all three points can behave like a triangle vertices, otherwise false.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Triangle other)
      Method checks if this triangle points are equals to the given argument triangle corresponding to each point.
      Parameters:
      other - the triangle to compare to.
      Returns:
      True if both triangles points equals to the given triangle points in the correct order.

    • isCongruent

      public boolean isCongruent​(Triangle other)
      Method checks if both triangles are congruent
      Parameters:
      other - Triangle to compare to
      Returns:
      True if both triangles are congruent, otherwise false.
